alert.note: Alert for San Bernardino County Mountains (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Watch issued November 19 at 1:41AM PST until November 21 at 10:00AM PST by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM PST THIS AFTERNOON... ...HIGH WIND WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING THROUGH TUESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...For the Wind Advisory, northwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts to 65 mph expected. For the High Wind Watch, northeast winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts to 70 mph possible. * WHERE...San Bernardino County Mountains. * WHEN...For the Wind Advisory, until 4 PM PST this afternoon. For the High Wind Watch, from this evening through Tuesday morning. * IMPACTS...Strong winds could damage trees and other objects. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.
